alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 11:10PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN WESTCHESTER AND ROCKLAND COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1110 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Haverstraw, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New City, Peekskill, Haverstraw, Yorktown Heights, Stony Point, Jefferson Valley, West Haverstraw, Congers, Croton-on-Hudson, Hillcrest, New Square, Mount Ivy, New Hempstead, Thiells, and Bardonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
